website_summaries.verdict: A speedy drone that offers excellent speed and performance.
pros: Lots of photo and video options
Portable and easy to fly and control
Can stay airborne up to 21 minutes
cons: Flight times per charge could be longer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible DJI Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great product with awesome quality videos but the customer service is the worst you could possibly ever deal with. Customer service is so poor that it is hard to beleive. If you buy the product hopefully you won’t have a problem. If you have a problem be prepared for a living hell. 3 stars due to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: The best drone for the travel enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the Phantom 1-4, the Inspire, and the Mavic Pro. That being said, the Mavic Air is probably the best drone I've owned so far. Although I'm not going to get the same quality that I would on the Inspire, the size factor is a big plus. It's so damn small and portable! And the 100mbps and slow motion features are a plus as well. Overall I'm very pleased with the Mavic Air and will be using this exclusively on all of my travel trips due to its increase in sensors, smaller size for portability, and decent battery length. DJI did good with this one! Oh, and the Flame Red is beautiful :-)
customer_reviews.author: Neil K

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the coolest adult toys I’ve ever purchased. Amazing photo quality, and insanely portable. I take this on backpacking and kayaking trips with extra batteries and don’t even notice its in my pack. Tiny, badass, and super quality. I seriously dig this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: I give it 4 star because customer service is not great. You really have to prove your case in ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is an incredible drone. Its the easiest thing in the world to fly. I give it 4 star because customer service is not great. You really have to prove your case in great detail if you want to get anything replaced under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: AaronSr

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous drone not a toy my loose control of it without warning!
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous little machine. I received a battery overheated message on the controller and I lost control over drone. Would not land, I did my best to keep it low but controls were unresponsive and could not land or power drone down. Crashed into tree branches and broke two propellers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Uhrlass

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.text: This drone seems great. Very durable and comes with a lot of accessories, but it's very in depth to get it up and running. I couldn't connect the remote control and app at the same time. I could change any of the parameters because of that reason so the altitude and distance were set really low. I tried several different methods and watched tons of videos with no success. Even tried multiple phones. It would be great if it were easier to get started. I had high Hope's for this drone but was very disappointed. Some of the buttons had the ink already faded off which makes me think it was previously used.
customer_reviews.author: amac

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Lost signal at an altitude of 200 feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Lost signal at an altitude of 200 feet regularly. My phantom 3 out performed the Mavic Air from a signal prospective. Will be waiting for the next version of the Mavic Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barrie

customer_reviews.title: The Drone flew to it'a death by a software malfunction the manufacture did honored warranty
customer_reviews.text: If you want a drone better get one without Geo Zones even in zones where it's allowed to fly it causes software issues if your GPS fails (which is very common, don't believe me check youtube under "I lost my Mavic" you will find hundreds of people complaining)
customer_reviews.author: Ryuk

customer_reviews.title: If you fly near water it will want to go for a swim
customer_reviews.text: Was fun until it decided to FLY AND LAND ITSELF INTO THE OCEAN. Extremely disappointed, could not get a replacement because dji warranty does not cover "lost drones". If you like to throw your money away this drone will do it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a Present; He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. He's purchased several accessories, and it has been used to capture several scenic stops on a recent road trip across the country. The battery lasts what you'd expect for a drone of this size and caliber, and, despite crashing a couple times, it has held up very well. The wide angle lens does a great job of capturing landscape shots, and it takes clear, high quality stills and video. The collision avoidance was one of the biggest characteristics that convinced us this drone was the best DJI for my husband which has significantly reduced some anxiety and saved the drone from even more crashes I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: sillylittleTpot

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product! This is my first round and I probably will never buy any other companies drone for the remainder of my life! All kidding aside, everything works so well. DJI did it again... I have flown this and the city, around the beach and in suburbs. It is awesome. Flight controls are super reactive and the Mavic Air is so smart yet gives you simpler "modes" if you aren't an enthusiast. The only complaint I have is that there is constant updating to do from a app perspective and firmware for the drone itself. It takes so much time... That takes away valuable time for me to fly! I understand it is important though so I shouldn't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: DJI update beware!
customer_reviews.text: Updates from DJI made the drone and the remote stop communicating. Very uncomfortable feeling. Lucky for us it was in the front yard and landed in the yard safely. Im returning the $1000 drone.
customer_reviews.author: loren

customer_reviews.title: DJI does not back the product
customer_reviews.text: DJI customer service is worthless. The drone just stopped communicating after 2 months and they will do nothing to help. We flew it about a dozen times for business pictures. It’s now a $1000 paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Texas

customer_reviews.title: Do not fly at night && near a tree && when it is windy!
customer_reviews.text: The first time, I fly the drone for less than 1 minute and it hangs on the tree, never come back. The drone keep climbing even I hit the landing button.Luckily I rescued it by a 20 feet pole. I just want to test the drone works or not, but it turns out to be a disaster. I am too over confident I can fly a new drone like a new car, drone is way much less controlled. my suggestion, Test everything in the room or an open space with no tree, no wind and during day time, if it is your first time fly.
customer_reviews.author: Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Great drone but it loves IOS way more than Android
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing but problems using the Mavic Air on my Moto Pure X android phone. I almost returned it because of the long guesswork process to get it initially connected, and then it dropped the connection often mid-flight! I got an iPad Mini 4 and there have been no problems at all so far. It's terrible it doesn't work well on Android (which it should do) but at least it works now (after $350 for the iPad and it's accessories).
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: HOLYHANNAH... that's her name!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS DRONE ITS VERY RELIABLE I USE IT ALL THE TIME =) got a monthly payment deal too thanks Amazon!! Its so easy to fly I'm in love it's got my getting up in the morning to fly I have nothing but farm land around me so I'm in heaven!! GET THIS DRONE IF YOU NEED A HOBBY HERE IT IS!!!! I SHOT 3 MUSIC VIDEOS IN A WEEKEND! I'm still enjoying it and there are endless things to do! The system is well built and the drone is made VERY WELL DJI YOU NEED AN AWARD!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgdwinst

customer_reviews.title: Beast Drone
customer_reviews.text: Love this entirely. I’ve never flown a drone before but I have played a lot of video games. If your naturally good at video games, you’ll definitely pick up the flying faster. Autonomous features are outstanding. Only complaint I have is that the still image 12mp camera is a bummer. Getting a higher mp camera must be their focus on the next generation bc everything else has been completely fine tuned. I use this for my real estate and for my nature adventures.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Buy from the website, NOT amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. However, I wish I had gone directly through the DJI website because I lost out on extra propellers, propeller protectors, and other equipment for the same price. Don’t make the same mistake I just did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is an opened box product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was an opened box. The box had no plastic factory seal and the box itself was re sealed! Check out my pictures and you’ll see what I’m talking about. Also the controller seal was open and seemed to be re-attached! I personally don’t really care since the drone works just fine, but I’m writing this for those who are wonder why this product is heavily discounted.
customer_reviews.author: Ebrahim Zahed

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Drones have come a long way and the Mavic Air is a great example of that fact. It’s small, easy to carry, yet stable in flight for its size and very difficult to make mistake with, due to its great flying system and stability controls. Ive been in around 20mph wind and it was still giving me confidence. The picture quality is great and the controls are intuitive. For the money, it flys and acts like a much more expensive drone. It’s a GREAT choice for the average to advanced user who wants to have something ready to go in a moments notice, yet be able to forget it’s in your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Topher Mecier

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over the DJI Spark
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Mavic Air because I wanted more battery life and better camera, now I have what I wanted and a lot more. The Mavic Air has better stability due to its 3 axis gimbal, also the manual camera controls give you better night shots and professional 4K video footage. The signal is more stable and you can go further whitout worries, many peolple complained about signal issues but once you manual setting the frequency chanel all signal problems are gone. I received the package in perfect conditions and on time. Mavic Air is for me the perfect travelling drone, as a DJI Spark old owner, Mavic Air is a big step forward to greater photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenio Ayala

customer_reviews.title: This is a dream Drone
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad can be said about this DJI product, perfect for beginners. Stories about crashing and blaming the product I can only say is due to a bad preflight check. This thing is full of sensors to avoid crashes and if you crashed it the most of the time can be due to weather, you went further the line of sight or got nervous and blew it up!!! Camera quality is very very good for such a small gimbal. Stability is perfect including in windy conditions, range is very good for its size and the system (wi fi) software very good and Battery life could be better.
customer_reviews.author: SergioArb

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. Amazing photos, amazing videos, range is great. Works amazing in rural areas, being closer to the city can break up signal a little but that's expected. I wish the battery life was longer but I knew what it was going into it. By the flymore combo, you'll be happy you did. Overall awesome and fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good Drone, Poor Service After the Sale
customer_reviews.text: Good Drone, but you better hope you never have any problems with it. The gimbal ring was so tight from the factory it was nearly impossible to loosen. It ended up scrubbed from the efforts, and customer service claims it had no replacement parts. A simple gimble ring. So be forewarned, if you ever have a problem, you might be stuck with a $1,000 paper weight. Their poor service after the sale reminds me of that of Panasonic, whose products I'll never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: thirty3na3rd

customer_reviews.title: it was with a great effort, its price is high
customer_reviews.text: It is the first Drone that I have acquired, it was with a great effort, its price is high, but it is worth it ... it is very advanced in terms of its different recording and flight modes. The flight time could be better, however, with extra batteries this stops being a limitation. The DJI App has good support and is updated constantly, now it can be found in Spanish in google play.
customer_reviews.author: Braddy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Great price and shipped fast. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed the mavic air, I was overwhelmed by all the the reading material and all of the steps needed to be taken before being able to operate the drone. That being said, it’s a necessary and smart step to take considering once this thing is gone... it’s gone. So make sure to read up and know what you’re doing. Get all of the updates and read up on FAA regulations. The rest is fun. Also first time flying you realize how quickly the battery runs out. Roughly 20 minutes or less per battery when fully charged. Once I was up and flying, it was fun and intuitive. The video quality was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Haas

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't scratched the surface of what this drone can do but have flown it enough to tell you it's easy and the camera quality is very impressive! The gimble is super steady even in the wind. I've seen the drown being jerked around by the wind and the video is still smooth and crisp. My wife sells Real Estate and that's the primary use. I researched drones for probably a year before buying this one and glad I did. The Mavic Air was prefect for us.
customer_reviews.author: tim sewald

customer_reviews.title: WorldWide Distributors Support is 0 for the product they sell
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, I bought this drone, after couple of uses the wifi connection doesn't work anymore and customer support is directing me to contact the manufacturer if I have any issues. So bottom line is that if you have any issues with the stuff they sell, you're on your own. Great!
customer_reviews.author: radu

customer_reviews.title: but love it. Smart device
customer_reviews.text: Still exploring all it can do, but love it. Smart device, has beginner mode that is practically fool proof. Video footage is phenomenal. I'm not a professional, so not sure it's good for commercial videography - but for a newbie hobbyist - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Doyon

customer_reviews.title: An amazing Drone from DJI
customer_reviews.text: An amazing Drone from DJI. Very responsive, steady video even on a windy day. I had a Spark, upgraded to the Air. Not sorry for the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon L Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone.
customer_reviews.text: Great balance between price and picture quality. Generally happy. Batteries don't last long when it is cold, 7-8 min and drone wants to come back when it is just below freezing. One annoying thing with software: doesn't want to fly until you perform an update. I had to download huge file over cell data connection and wait 20+ min until the unit updates itself. So make sure you active the drone and get it updated periodically if you don't fly it often.
customer_reviews.author: MikeA

customer_reviews.title: feels solid
customer_reviews.text: just got it today, setting it up did not fly yet.. because the set up takes time. One of the motors when checking the aircraft feels like its turns little harder, front right one.. Founds some post about it online too. Hope it will be ok and not overheat.. Wish DJi would do better quality checks after production since this is an aircraft like item. 1 star less for now..
customer_reviews.author: LogoQRcode.com

customer_reviews.title: Good starter drone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter drone but doesn’t hold up for what we bought it for. My husband does automotive videography and the WiFi signal it uses to connect isn’t strong enough to follow cars around the track with ease (not a giant track, small drifting set ups) Overall it was a good investment and good way to start getting into drones but we haven’t had it for a year and he’s already ready to level up to something more professional
customer_reviews.author: C. Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product on unopened DJI original sealed box Came with : one drone battery , different phone cable applications , remote, extra set of propellers,All kinds of instruction manuals ,charger for both drone battery and controller and drone case. By far I am happy with this drone gets really long range high quality image. : note buy a micro SD for 4k recording all other cards Will not give you 4k recording.
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Crashed it 5 times in the first 3 weeks of owning it. Still runs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: First drone I've ever owned but it is amazing. Clear shots, extremely durable, and hella fun to fly. The battery life is a bit short especially when trying to get shots far away, but I purchased two extra batteries and it's the best investment for this drone. Only complaint is that I was missing a charger cable, but the seller was very prompt in replacing it for me. Would recommend this seller and drone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks cool with a drone right? This was my first drone. DJI has it down! With all the safety features on, it is almost idiot proof. But be careful when telling this to your friends... my friend forgot that trees are mostly air :( ...Bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Beware Does not come with everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: So after finally waiting for my product to show up I cant even fly it! For one it did not come with the adapter to charge my remote, and it also didn't come with any adapters for smart phones so now I have to order more things just to be able to fly this thing. Should have just waited For the official Dji to get more in stock... Product says its used but in excellent condition and failed to mention it comes pre scratched for you.. Nice touch for the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Kyler c

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but Weak
customer_reviews.text: Video is good. Flying time is not really a problem. It's the signal from the remote. It is constantly interrupted. It has almost no range where it is reliable. Every flight is like a game of chance on if something usable will come out. Maybe if you are flying within 50 feet of the subject. Maybe it's good for indoors. The Mavic is about the same size and much better with distance. I am disappointed with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: My first legit drone and I love it. I take it with me everywhere I go. It's fast when I want to play, it's steady when I want to shoot video. It's SO easy to fly. I let my 9 year old son fly it all the time. I have even let my friends 6 year old fly it without issues. Set up the controls like the kid uses in their video games, and it's second nature to them.
customer_reviews.author: n-o-sent

customer_reviews.title: Gimbal issues and return to home issues
customer_reviews.text: I have had the "gimbal motor overload issue" a few times, which is annoying. Also, the gimbal wheel is really unresponsive. In addition, the return to home function does not work at all - it literally does nothing at all - and I operate in locations with strong GPS signal. So far this has not bothered me much, but I could see this as an issue for a lot of users. The Mavic Air is really expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: NWguy

customer_reviews.title: Great things come in small packages!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing drone! I would’ve given it five stars all across the board but I just don’t think for this magnificent piece of equipment should be for beginners. Although they do have beginner mode. All the different cinematic mode for nothing short of amazing. There are some other drones that are more expensive but do not offer these features. This little guy can be thrown into the backpack and go with you on any adventure you go on. Also it is built to last. I’ve already had a few accidents. And it’s still going strong. Can’t say enough good things about this! What a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C.

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can learn to fly this. It has safety features for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son earned this through good grades. After 3 months and *a lot* of use and aerial photography, the batteries work as well as they did the day we bought it. I credit DJI on their software and hardware. Excellent quality. I’d like to add that joining the academy of model aeronautics (AMA) is a good choice so you have insurance and support don’t forget your FAA license too
customer_reviews.author: W.O. In Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in real estate so I got this to give me an edge with listings and also check a little closer on roof conditions. Right out of the box, this drone was super easy to use. DJI always makes great quality products. The flight time could be better but I usually get about 9 minutes of video in before I have to fly it back to land. You’ll also want to download the app AirMap so you can check on restricted airspace around you.
customer_reviews.author: N Bell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. He knew he was getting it because he did all the research. He loves it. I got it to replace the older drone he had. What a difference. This drone zips around so much more quickly. The video is better than the older one. When I saw how small it is I had my doubts, but its proven itself to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The iphone Cable
customer_reviews.text: Once i open the box and start to configure for the first flight... after try and try and try.... i note that the The cable for the iphone who is come with the package do not work, i am using my long one iphone cable. So i need the original short one or maybe i could return the product.
customer_reviews.author: DRONE DEL SUR

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality
customer_reviews.text: It has a poor battery durability, bad stability and susceptible to interference
customer_reviews.author: Elkin Gonzalez V.

customer_reviews.title: Trouble connecting with DJI controller
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it, except that there’s one problem.. it would not connect to the controller at all. Had to send the item to the manufacturer to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mallavo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as good as my pro as far ad range but very good all the same
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Upgrade from Phantom 3 standard!
customer_reviews.text: Used to own the Phantom 3 standard and am amazed at how much better this drone is. The controller design and the size of the drone are awsome. It is very easy to travel with this drone compared to my old one. The first flight a flew I think a mile away compared to the 1/2 mile range from my old drone. The camera quality being 4K 30fps or 2.7k 60fps is absolutely stunning. I would definitely recommend this drone to anyone looking to get a great drone to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ruth

customer_reviews.title: this is the best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: this is the best of both worlds, I have a Phantom 3 and a Spark ant the Mavic Air sums the versatility of one with the capabilities of the PH3!
customer_reviews.author: Avyaboy

customer_reviews.title: A Blast to Fly
customer_reviews.text: I am not a photographer in any sense of the word but with this drone and camera I can capture some pretty cool images, and very easily too. I mainly use this to fly around and have fun and that it can do well. The hand control works great. I have found that I cannoy fly it as far as advertised, however, I believe it is due to where I fly i get a lot of interferance.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit. Can't fly nearly as far away as my phantom 4pro but much more compact to carry on a vacation so it does exactly what I purchased it for
customer_reviews.author: landlw

customer_reviews.title: flew it once and it is great, does everything as stated
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Mavic Air today, flew it once and it is great, does everything as stated. Super stable flying, feels like its un-crashable. Picture quality is like something out of a movie. Ive read other reviews saying it is a loud drone, but i don't think its any louder than you would expect, easily able to have a conversation with it hovering right next to you. If your thinking about getting this, get it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. But a word of warning
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. But a word of warning. DO NOT fly it until it "knows" where it is and everything looks cool. You tube "how to's" help a lot. I flew it too soon and thought I'd lost it. My fault...it's a computer with wings. Simple and fun once you understand the basics.
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: Best drone in the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best experience ever! I’m really in love with this Drone, it meets all my expectations. It is my first time flying this, and it is pretty cool having an eye on sky. Photos, videos and features are amazing! It is very easy to use, and understand. A+ for DJI. Things they need to improve? 1. Reduce the noise. 2. More battery life. 3. Add zoom. 4. Add lateral sensors. There are a lot more to say about this.... Recommended to try!
customer_reviews.author: signos17

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Drone
customer_reviews.text: Just Love my new DJI Mavic Air. Was almost going to buy the DJI Mavic 2 Pro. But, this is my first Drone and didn’t want to spend twice as much on a Drone that I could possibly destroy when learning. Save that investment in a lead espensive option for now. I’m still in the learning curve phase. So far it has performed flawlessly. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Will help my YouTube channel greatly.
customer_reviews.text: I started with a Go Pro Karma (which lost GPS) and fell out of the sky in the mountains in Colorado. Go Pro needs to stick with action cameras, DJI has this in the bag.... I love this thing, not to mention that DJI made this 1/5th the weight and footprint of the Karma. This will help my channel grow and I am hoping that by reading this review you too will subscribe to see what we have coming up. Update 07/30/18 - Sport mode will make this thing FLY (no pun). Update 07/31/18 - Registered with the FAA
customer_reviews.author: Zion Ranch on YouTube

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: First, this is an amazing piece of technology you need to own. I am a first time drone buyer and this is beyond expectations. I also stumbled across the best travel case. This case is designed for a projector I own, but happened to fit the air plus accessories absolutely perfect. Search for Hermitshell Hard Travel Case Fits Ragu Z400 and see pictures for air plus basic kit within case. Fly safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: Great drone. Love the advanced flight modes and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great drone. Love the advanced flight modes and the photo video quality is great! Super easy to fly too. My only complaint is that its a little noisy. Would give 4.5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gadget of the year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for real estate videos, it works great, the video quality is good enough for professional home tour videos. It is easy to use with a learning curve and seems to keep itself safe. It is an amazing piece of engineering for the price. It seems it will last for a long time. I have been using it for about 6 months and it is still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best features of the Pro and the Spark, in a more portable package. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Gracen

customer_reviews.title: Not inspected properly before reselling
customer_reviews.text: This drone out of the box seemed to have been in the sand, because all four motors had trouble spinning and had a grinding feel. On start there was a overheat warning, probably because of some sand in the main cooling fan. 1 of 3 batteries where dead, no point in overpaying for 2 batteries. The drone itself is a fun device to have for travel, but with this many problems out of the box just ain't right.
customer_reviews.author: Slav

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it works great for me. I am a beginner and the app really helps with all of my questions. The video quality is awesome and there are a lot of neat editing features you can use. Flying is easy and fun
customer_reviews.author: shawn nelson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I played around with a few 50-200 dollar drones and knew I wanted something more professional. The quality and ease of use is really impressive, no other drone is even close to DJI, if you are serious about a drone it's a great choice, all other brands are just toys.
customer_reviews.author: WillHenry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Capabilities - not a toy - great drone
customer_reviews.text: This drone is amazing. Purchased for my husband’s Xmas- first time drone owner. It took a few days to be comfortable with it but the features such as beginner mode, object avoidance, hand signal response and many more make this a great purchase. The battery life is about 20 minutes but there are 3 batteries so it’s fine for the size. We’ve already used it to check the top of our chimney for wasp nests and our gutters. We own about 6 acres so he intends to use it to check out our property. Definitely more than a toy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Texas pen name

customer_reviews.title: What a drone!
customer_reviews.text: The Drone is all that I expected. I can't do it justice speaking about it here. Google it and watch a review where they demonstrate its abilities.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Drone, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the drone. only a few issues, 1. Battery life SUCKS!! 2. Sometime the auto landing doesn't work. 3. Makes a lot of noise. Other than that its a very powerful drone with great image quality. Love the built-in auto modes. great buy for starters.
customer_reviews.author: UltimateDreamZz

customer_reviews.title: Check warehouse deals!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on a returned fly more kit. Not much over 600. Nothing wrong with it! At that price no brainer. Thing is sick. Amazing features. Easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: the North

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Drone
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my brother. He is a drone fanatic. He loves it. He showed me a few things about it and took some pictures with it etc. Very cool Drone. The "land back where you took off from" feature is very handy also. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Adwizards

customer_reviews.title: World's best small drone!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this technology. Study all the you tubes...I cant say enough great things!
customer_reviews.author: gregg333

customer_reviews.title: Great product, recommend cheaper one.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used it in Hawaii for a family vacation. Doesn’t do the greatest in windy situations but what do you expect from a small drone. Pretty easy to use. Fly it in an empty field at first to get used to the controls. I flew it over the ocean for my secon flight and freaked out a little but it survived. Pictures are great quality and the video is unbelievable in 4K. Reason for recommendations on a cheaper drone, for half the price, you can get a spark with same futures just no 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bibaeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and surprising drone
customer_reviews.text: I watched a lot review videos before I purchased it. It is definitely an amazing drone if you are just looking for recreational (not very pro one, like fly high into the cloud or fly 10 mile away) and portable one to take with when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Love flying this!
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely glad I got this. The only slight complaint is that I was hoping to get a bit closer to the max battery life. It seems that you can only do that by not getting anywhere near the top speed for the mode you are in. The longest I have gotten out of the battery is about 16 minutes. Its max is 21 minutes. Still, I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great with the fly more bundle
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought one for myself and really enjoy it. Much more compact than my GoPro Karma. DJI App is great, easy to calibrate, beginners lessons are key to have for first time flyers. Gimbal is a little stiff on turns compared to the GoPro but the picture quality is great. Just purchased another for my dad to use and he was quick to learn. Definitely recommend multiple batteries due to the short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Natkinson

customer_reviews.title: Straight out of the box...batteries not charging
customer_reviews.text: Never got to try the drone because none of the batteries were charging. Straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the drone! Just remember to get an SD card with a write speed as close to 100MB/s as you can...it take a while to download the updates and you may need to connect to computer for downloads
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real drone and the performance and quality is amazing. It flies like a bird and takes awesome photo and video. I have tried the cheaper off-brand drones and let me tell you, do not waste your money on those. Get a DJI mavic air and don't look back. You will need several batteries, I currently have three and that usually gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Price

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun. watch out for that RTH function!
customer_reviews.text: my first drone and after a few successful flights it took a tumble through a tree. for some reason, the return to home function was off by a hundred feet and it clipped a few branches and fell down through the tree about 50 feet. the only things broken were 3 props. replaced them and took off again. so, I don't trust that RTH completely, although it's been within feet ever since on RTH. so, this thing is made pretty darn solid. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: who goosed the moose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone it’s worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: This drone is amazing. It’s been crashed twice and hit by a truck going about 40mph. I replaced 2 propellers and the drone flies like nothing happened except for a few scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone
customer_reviews.text: Great little drone. I have a few DJI and this one is worth it’s weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Airw6554

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - compact and easy to use - extra batteries are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koach

customer_reviews.title: My best drone so far.
customer_reviews.text: I been waiting for ever for something this small and awesome. I'm definitely going to take this hiking. This guy can do some pretty precise flying like inches away. I don't feel like it could crash at any moment like my other drones. 40+mph is pretty fun to.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: My New Toy... Mavic Air
customer_reviews.text: Three batteries, charger and everything you would need... except a good case. I did opt for the Smatree Carrying Case. This thing is fun. The YouTube tutorials are helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miles J Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is lacking but the fun and customization is not. There is a significant learning curve that comes with the Mavic Air however, even with that curve, it is a fun immediately coming out of the box. The packaging is genius and the quality is unparalleled. I would suggest this drone for anyone considering investing in this line of product.
customer_reviews.author: Jered Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Best first drone
customer_reviews.text: First drone I ever bought and I love it! I’ve done tons of research and i had my eye on the Mavic Pro but decided to go with the Air. I love the portability, I take it in every trip I go on
customer_reviews.author: Jad Husayni

customer_reviews.title: Best Done Around for Non Pros
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Spoiled myself with this and surprised how easy it was to learn and setup. The flight time is 20 minutes which sucks, but definitely fun the whole time. Love the additional modes you can use with great effect. High quality drone. Have recommended this to many
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: This drone is fantastic and for been the second on the line one before the last one on the DJI line, overall is a great addition to your photo or video set. Nice quality and very reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GO4 APP Crashes in 8 Seconds...
customer_reviews.text: The GO 4 App crashes consistently at 8 seconds! Tried pushing Firmware and Map updates via PC and MAC...no joy. Hoping its justa glitch with the unit I got, and have ordered a replacement. We’ll see. 🙏🤔
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: is just awesome, easy to fly, resistent, nice pics and Video, the bad is the BAttery (only 10 mins) so you have to get extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: APH

customer_reviews.title: Scam, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is a scam. Product arrived defective. Upon return, we were not refunded and told that incorrect item was returned. We are out $800 and never had a functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tabeling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine. I upgraded from the Phantom 3 Advanced and have no regrets. The P3A had no problem with distance, easily going past 1 mile. I have not tested the Mavic to that distance yet but 1000 yards is easy with no loss of signal or control, WiFi works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nuernberg

customer_reviews.title: A slight yet significant upgrade from the DJI Spark
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade from the spark. The 4K video is great , the camera is more stable, I can fly faster in both sport and non-sport modes and the battery gives me about 4 mins more time over the spark.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Love this Drone!
customer_reviews.text: Did a TON of research of the past few months and finally bought the Mavic Air. I couldn't be happier! So fun to fly, amazing video quality, and EXTREMELY SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.author: roboemon

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly with incredible camera quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a beginner pilot and this drone has been a breeze to fly. Compared to other drones on the market this is one of the best and the best at this price point. You cannot go wrong with DJI
customer_reviews.author: Ben Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great first time drone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I could not be happier. Easy to use. Safety features and awesome pics and video. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tacticalmormon

customer_reviews.title: Zero Morals - Busted remote controller
customer_reviews.text: This drone was clearly used before. The controller’s microUSB port is busted!! Where are your morals as a company? It’s stuff like this makes people not want to buy DJI’s products. This company should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade for my Spark! So far, I’m loving it and big change in the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Moe A.

customer_reviews.title: Mavic Air the best drone
customer_reviews.text: This magic air is so much better then my first DJI vision 11 . Easy to operate quality pictures and a thrill to fly.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this drone! Here's the first video we made with it last week in Nukutepipi :)
